mean_en: a cell that carries messages between the brain and other parts of the body and that is the basic unit of the nervous system
word_etyma: neur神经 + on名词后缀 → neuron 神经元
sentence: Isn't it wonderful that all our thoughts are produced by tiny neurons?
sentence_trans: 我们所有的思想都是由微小的神经元产生的，这难道不精妙吗？
